name: mnemospark-backend cloud environment
install: bash -lc 'if [ ! -d /workspace/.venv ]; then PY=$(command -v python3.13 2>/dev/null || command -v python3) && $PY -m venv --without-pip /workspace/.venv && curl -sS https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | /workspace/.venv/bin/python; fi && source /workspace/.venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt'
